name: Easy Ground Turkey Stew
author: IndyBlakester
summary: Easy slow cooker soup made with ground turkey to limit the fat but not the taste! Serve with bread and butter!
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
4 medium potatoes, peeled and thickly sliced
6 medium carrots, peeled and thickly sliced
directions: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat
Cook and stir ground turkey with salt and pepper to taste in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes
Place turkey in the bottom of a slow cooker
Add onion, followed by potatoes and carrots
Mix tomato soup with Worcestershire, seasoned salt, and 1 teaspoon pepper; stir into the slow cooker until everything is coated
Cover and cook until vegetables are tender, on Low, 6 to 8 hours, or High, 3 to 4 hours
